# Climate-wise Reforestation Toolkit  

[banner photo at top with examples of nicely spaced and arranged reforestation]  

This site includes three resources intended to inform post-disturbance reforestation practices in the Sierra Nevada mountains: 1) a spatial prioritization tool, 2) a post-drought stand condition summary tool, and 3) reforestation best management practices. The purpose and methodology of each resource is summarized here. More detailed information can be found...
